newsitem.title: CHINA: COSCO Pac expands into financial services.
newsitem.headline: COSCO Pac expands into financial services.

text.p: COSCO Pacific Ltd intends to expand further into financial services and related businesses, the company said on Tuesday.
COSCO Pacific was taking a 20 percent stake in Hong Kong listed Liu Chong Hing Bank Ltd, the company said in a statement.
"The company will continue to look at other investment opportunities in the financial sector in line with this business strategy," it said.

Diversification into financial services will provide significant long-term savings in the financing of the company's core business operations as well as provide a new profit centre for the company, the statement said.

The company is principally engaged in container owning and leasing, manufacturing of refrigerated containers, production of container and marine paint, container terminal and depot operating and other container services, it said.
